alert.note: Alert for West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 2:54AM PDT until October 25 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 16 inches above 3000 feet, and 16 to 24 inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area, Paradise on Mount Rainier, Ashford, Randle, and Packwood. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions possible at times across the mountain passes. Early season snowfall could make outdoor recreation difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
